name: graphql-service
description: This project contains source code and supporting files for a serverless application that you can deploy with the SAM CLI. It includes the following files and folders.

scripts.start: npm run build && sam local start-api -p 4000 --warm-containers lazy --env-vars ./devenv.json
scripts.typecheck: (cd apollo && npm run typecheck) && (cd ../payment-service && npm run typecheck) && (cd ../auth-service && npm run typecheck) && (cd ../cli && npm run typecheck) && (cd ../gateway-service && npm run typecheck)
